mapper.select: select t.job_id as jobId,t.warning_type as warningType, t.person_type as personType,t1.person_name as personName, t1.person_email as personEmail,t1.person_phone as personPhone from job_warning_person_relation t join job_warning_person_info t1 on t.person_id = t1.id and t.is_del = 0 and t1.is_del = 0 and t.job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.warning_type = #{warningType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
